About Me

Welcome to my page! My name is Maria—I am a final year Master's student of Sorbonne University, pursuing a degree in Control Systems and Robotics. I am eager to deepen my knowledge in the domaine of intelligent systems. On this page you will find all my worthy projects, as well as my experience and education. Feel free to reach out.

Experience

Distributed Intelligent Systems and Algorithms Laboratory - EPFL

Master Thesis/Internship in Learning-Based Robust Distributed Model Predictive Control for MAV Formations — Febraury 2026 - September 2026

I am developing a learning-enhanced robust distributed NMPC controller for multi-drone formation flight under aerodynamic coupling and perception constraints, with simulation and real-world validation.

Insititute of Intelligent Systems and Robotics - Sorbonne University

Internship in Machine Learning — May 2025 - July 2025

Developed and optimized a deep learning pipeline for automatic marker labeling in motion capture (MoCap) data in Python.

  • Improved a preprocessing system for cleaning and standardizing noisy C3D files with variable marker sets. (EZC3D, Trackpy)
  • Adapted an LSTM-based labeling model with validation tracking, early stopping, and automated grid search.
  • Enhanced the GUI for manual correction with improved visualization and label handling.
Python PyTorch NumPy Matplotlib ezc3d C3D LSTM

PEUTY

Internship in Embedded Systems/IoT — May 2024 - July 2024

Developed and optimized a deep learning pipeline for automatic marker labeling in motion capture (MoCap) data in Python.

  • Improved a preprocessing system for cleaning and standardizing noisy C3D files with variable marker sets. (EZC3D, Trackpy)
  • Adapted an LSTM-based labeling model with validation tracking, early stopping, and automated grid search.
  • Enhanced the GUI for manual correction with improved visualization and label handling.
Bash Raspberry Pi
